channel.title: damn on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in damn on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Angel committed suicide
item.description: 09:32 Thursday 11 February 2016 JST Fucking hell. Angel, who I knew originally as Red Fern back on the Castle of Dreams (on Fidonet) has apparently committed suicide. Someone on her page wrote something like “I cannot forgive you for this; you had so many people to turn to….” I have similar sentiments; I know she had some medical debt, and some medical issues, but dang.. could that have warranted a bullet to the head?
